snippet: The company added 67,000 net digital-only subscriptions last quarter and now counts close to 1.4 million digital-only subscriptions.
abstract: New York Times Company reports $14 million net loss in first quarter 2016; reports net gain of 67,000 digital-only subscriptions.
lead_paragraph: The company added 67,000 net digital-only subscriptions last quarter and now counts close to 1.4 million digital-only subscriptions.

headline.main: New York Times Co. Reports Loss as Digital Subscriptions Grow
headline.print_headline: Times Co. Posts Loss; Subscriptions Grow Online
